          <title>
            <string language="fr">Couches sédimentaires de roche dans des falaises</string>
            <string language="en">Sedimentary rock layers in cliffs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sedimentäre Felsenschichten in den Klippen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Camadas sedimentary da rocha nos penhascos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Strati sedimentari della roccia in scogliere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιζηματώδη στρώματα βράχου στους απότομους βράχους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Capas sedimentarias de la roca en acantilados</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme illustre une section transversale d'une falaise montrant ses couches de roches sédimentaires.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates a cross-section of a cliff showing its layers of sedimentary rocks.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="fr">Falaises</string>
            <string language="en">Cliffs</string>
          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht einen Querschnitt
einer Klippe, die seine Schichten sedimentäre Felsen zeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra um cross-section de um 
penhasco que mostra suas camadas de rochas sedimentary.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra una sezione trasversale di
una scogliera che mostra i relativi strati delle roccie sedimentarie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί μια διατομή ενός απότομου
βράχου που εμφανίζει στρώματα ιζηματωδών βράχων του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra una sección representativa
de un acantilado que muestra sus capas de rocas sedimentarias.</string>
          </description>
